member.name: T:WpfTrayIcon.ToolTipIcon
member.summary:
The ToolTipIcon enumeration defines a small set of standardized icons that can be displayed as part of a ToolTip.
Reimplementation of , so that no reference is needed outside of this dll.
member.remarks: This is accomplished by setting the ToolTip.ToolTipIcon property of the ToolTip class to one of the following values.
